td.content: s:patient presents with Heart for about 4 weeks. patient is a white male aged 67 yrs. he has smoked 2 pack cigarettes daily for 4 years Alcohol 1-4 beers/month o:Height 170 cm, Weight 84.3 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 87, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 16 a:Hemorrhagic Stroke p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to cardiology.

s:white male retired aged 67 ys says he is having symptoms of Heart 18-20 x day, mostly during the day. he drinks alcohol occasionally he has smoked two packs of cigarettes daily for 2 years o:Height 170 cm, Weight 84.7 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 87, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16 a:Hemorrhagic Stroke p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered CT Head, ECG.

td.content: s:pt with moderate diarrhea, moderate nausea and moderate constipation. he has had several such episodes over past 2 years. he is a white male retired aged 67 years. o:Height 170 cm, Weight 85 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 87, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 16, Abdomen = distended and tender, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs a:Irritable Bowel p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to gastroenterology.

s:a 67 yo white m says he is having symptoms of moderate constipation 3 x week, in spite of treatment. he smokes approx. 40 cigarettes daily for past 3 years he reports having no more than one drink a day o:Height 170 cm, Weight 85 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 87, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 16, Abdomen = distended and tender, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs a:Irritable Bowel p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Basic Metabolic Panel.
